about_the_game:
Scrapping Simulator

- A First Person Simulator that puts you in the Role of an Australian E-Waste Scrapper, dismantling and recycling Electronic Waste(E-Waste). Your role is to find E-Waste and Junk that previous owners have thrown out, you can then Disassemble your collected E-Waste.
Scrapping E-Waste will yield you Raw Materials such as Copper, Silver, Gold etc you can then Sell your Raw Materials for a quick profit at the Scrap Yard, ideally when the Market is high, you can also sell off unwanted Items at the Pawn Shop, as well as buy Upgrades/Quality of Life Purchases from the Hardware Store to grow your Scrapping Empire.

Join our Discord server to get amongst a great community:


  • Help your Town/Landfill from overflowing with Pollution producing E-Waste by Collecting and Safely Processing the E-Waste in this Simulated exaggeration of the Throw-A-Way Lifestyle faced today.
  • Race against time Early Morning to get the High Quality E-Waste Items before other Scrappers beat you to it.
  • Hop on your Personal Computer to check current Market Prices, check emails, Track Active Deliveries, View Tips and Tricks, or Play some Games.
  • Disassemble E-Waste taking everything off, down to the last Chip, PCB and Screw etc, gathering their respective Raw Materials.
  • Sell Raw Materials to the Scrap Yard for a quick profit or wait until the Material is a better price to earn the most profit.
  • Purchase Upgrades from the Hardware Store to increase your productivity, from Better Tools, Ingot Forging Products, Item Transport, Ingot Storage etc.
  • Gain Disassembling, Trading and Scavenging Levels, earn Perk Points to spend on Perks to give more Insight to E-Waste and Rewards.
  • Collect your Raw Materials and Smelt them into Ingots using the Furnace and Crucible for a larger profit.
  • For Precious Metals such as Gold and Silver you can use a Chemical Process to extract the Pure Gold/Silver.
Some of the Deconstruct-able E-Waste Objects the game currently includes is:

  • LCD TV
  • Personal Computer
  • Laptop
  • Microwave
  • DVD Player
  • Digital Video Recorder (DVR)
  • Game Console
  • Server
  • Router
  • Hard Disk Drive (HDD)
  • Graphics Processing Unit (GPU)
  • Network Card
  • RAM Sticks (2,4,8,16 & 32GB with DDR3 & DDR4 Variants)
  • Power Supply Unit
  • And many more planned to come in future updates!

The list of Internal parts is also an ever growing list as more E-Waste Items are added, some of the Internal Parts currently included in the game is:

  • IC Chips
  • BGA Chips
  • Crystal Oscillators
  • Transformers
  • Capacitors
  • CPUs
  • Screws
  • Heat Sinks
  • GPUs
  • HDDs
  • CD Drives
  • Power Boards and Motherboards
  • and more with plenty to come in the future!

name: Scrapping Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 @ 3.1 GHz | AMD FX-6300 @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 | AMD R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 @ 3.4 GHz | AMD Ryzen 5 1600 @ 3.2 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 or AMD R9 290X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: A Low Poly eWaste Scrapping Simulator Game. Disassemble Electronics down to the last Chip, PCB and Screw to Gain Raw Materials, Forge Raw Materials into Ingots, Use a Chemical Process to refine Gold, Invest in Upgrades to grow your business & Much More, Check out Scrapping Simulator Today!
